title: Why does my Talkband B1 vibrate from time to time without any warnings on the screen?
answer:
The metal contacts in your B1 may be short-circuited. Checkthe following three positions. If any foreign matter is found, clean it up.
1. The five metal contacts in the rear of theheadset. Check whether they are damp or there is any water or foreign matter onthem.
2. The five metal terminals in the headset slot onthe wrist band. Check whether they are in the same height. Press each terminalto see whether they will bounce back to the normal height. Check whether there isany foreign matter, water drops, or other agents that may cause short circuits.
3. USB charger contact. Checkwhether there is any foreign matter, water drops, or other agents that maycause short circuits.
